info.Summary: The 'SAVE DATA' button is smaller than the others
info.Environment: Huawei P30 lite, Android 10, 10.0.0.560(C461E6R1P1) GPU Turbo, Модель: MAR-LX1B, Версия EMUI: 10.0.0.<.Environment> Open the App The 'SAVE DATA' button is smaller than the others The application buttons have one view Low Trivial https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ehl6btawxi2NbNtwKYwE4VhvKWUaWL_M/view?usp=sharing"
